name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Tinted Lip Oil with Hyaluronic Acid, Designed to Hydrate & Nourish While Providing a Luxurious Pop of Color for Fuller-Looking Lips, Light Pink, .2 fl. oz
short_description: .2-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Lip Oil with Hyaluronic Acid, a glossy, hydrating lip oil in a flattering Light Pink shade that nourishes & enhances the appearance of lips, bringing out their natural color

Tinted lip oil has a rich looking texture that combines the shine of a lip gloss and leaves lips feeling softer & smoother. The glossy oil features a formula that provides a luxurious pop of color & is developed for beautiful, fuller-looking lips

The hydrating lip oil is formulated with purified hyaluronic acid, an essential hydrator found naturally in skin recognized by dermatologists that binds to water & holds it within skin's surface for more supple and smooth lips

The nourishing lip oil with hydrating hyaluronic acid provides a luxurious tint and is designed for smoother, more supple-looking lips while enhancing their natural color. The glossy lip balm is formulated without parabens or mineral oil

Tinted gloss from Neutrogena, a dermatologist-recommended brand, adds luxurious shine to any look. Apply alone on clean lips or as a topcoat over lipstick or lip balm for extra lustrous shine as a part of your daily lip care & beauty routine
product_description: Designed to hydrate and nourish lips, Neutrogena’s Hydro Boost Lip Oil with Hyaluronic Acid in a flattering Light Pink shade. This tinted lip oil from Neutrogena, a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand, combines the shine of a lip gloss and leaves lips feeling smoother while designed to hydrate and enhance the look of lips, bringing out their natural color. The moisturizing lip gloss is formulated with purified hyaluronic acid, an essential hydrator found naturally in skin that binds to water and holds it within skin's surface for more supple and smooth lips. Designed to give you beautiful, fuller-looking lips, the hydrating lip oil is formulated without parabens or mineral oil and provides a luxurious pop of color to enhance any day or night look. To use, apply the lip oil alone on clean lips or as a topcoat over lipstick or lip balm for extra lustrous shine as a part of your daily lip care and beauty routine.

product_description: Burt's Bees Misty Mauve Tinted Boosted Lip Balm instantly takes your lips to lovely, soft and hydrated in one pretty swipe. Made with responsibly sourced shea butter, botanical waxes and a softly tinted buildable color, this moisturizing lip balm accentuates your lips while delivering 24-hour moisture. The Misty Mauve tint has a naturally flattering, deep mauve hue to enhance your lips while keeping them nourished and hydrated. The unflavored lip balm features a core formulated with vitamins C, E and F that provides antioxidant protection and moisture barrier reinforcement for dry lips. The smooth texture adds a semi-glossy finish to your lips without any shimmer or pearlescence. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS, this lip balm is 100% natural origin to rejuvenate and beautify lips with clean ingredients. You can conveniently tuck a tube into your pocket or purse to keep nurturing lip care handy always.
